name: @example/param-editors
description: Example GenArt API param editor GUIs
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.css:watch: node_modules/.bin/metacss develop --bundle --watch --pretty --out-specs css/framework.json --out-css css/style.css --force @css/includes.txt node_modules/@thi.ng/meta-css/specs/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss
scripts.css:build: node_modules/.bin/metacss develop --bundle --out-specs css/framework.json --out-css css/style.css --force @css/includes.txt node_modules/@thi.ng/meta-css/specs/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss
scripts.start: yarn build:prepare && yarn css:build && yarn start:only
scripts.build: yarn build:prepare && yarn css:build && tsc && vite build --base='./'
